subject: End Semester Examination Schedule Released
summary: The end semester examination timetable for all departments is now available.
body:
The end semester examination schedule has been published on the university portal.

Students are advised to carefully review the dates, timings, and venue details for each course. Any clashes or discrepancies must be reported to the Controller of Examinations within two working days.

Failure to adhere to the schedule will not be considered as grounds for re-examination.

subject: Campus Drive – Infosys Registration Open
summary: Eligible final-year students can now register for the Infosys campus recruitment drive.
body:
The Placement Cell invites applications for the Infosys campus recruitment drive scheduled next month.

Interested students must complete their registration through the placement portal and upload the required documents before the deadline.

Late or incomplete applications will not be considered.

subject: Merit Scholarship Application Deadline
summary: The deadline to apply for the merit-based scholarship is approaching.
body:
Students who are eligible for the merit-based scholarship are reminded to submit their applications online.

Ensure that all academic records and supporting documents are uploaded correctly. Applications submitted after the deadline will be automatically rejected.

For queries, contact the Scholarship Office during working hours.

subject: Course Registration Approval Required
summary: Faculty advisor approval is required to complete next semester course registration.
body:
Course registration for the upcoming semester is currently pending advisor approval.

Students must meet their assigned faculty advisor and obtain approval through the academic portal.

Registration will be considered incomplete until approval is granted.

subject: Hall Ticket Download Instructions
summary: Students must download and print hall tickets before examinations begin.
body:
Hall tickets for the end semester examinations are now available for download.

Students should log in to the examination portal and print their hall ticket well in advance.

No student will be permitted to enter the examination hall without a valid hall ticket.

subject: Pre-Placement Talk – Amazon
summary: Amazon will conduct a pre-placement talk detailing roles and hiring process.
body:
Amazon will be conducting a pre-placement talk for eligible students.

The session will cover job roles, compensation details, and the overall recruitment process.

Attendance is strongly recommended for students planning to apply.

subject: Government Scholarship Document Verification
summary: Shortlisted students must complete in-person document verification this week.
body:
Students shortlisted for the government scholarship must appear in person for document verification.

Original documents along with photocopies are required. The verification schedule is available on the portal.

Failure to attend will result in cancellation of the scholarship application.

subject: Notice: University Holiday
summary: The university will remain closed tomorrow due to administrative reasons.
body:
This is to inform all students and staff that the university will remain closed tomorrow.

All academic and administrative activities will resume as per the regular schedule on the following working day.

Please plan accordingly.

subject: Guest Lecture on Artificial Intelligence
summary: A guest lecture on recent advances in artificial intelligence will be held.
body:
The Department of Computer Science is organizing a guest lecture on recent advances in artificial intelligence.

The lecture will be delivered by an industry expert and is open to all interested students.

Details regarding venue and timing are available on the department notice board.

subject: Internship Opportunity – Summer 2026
summary: Applications are open for paid summer internships with partner companies.
body:
The Placement Cell is accepting applications for summer internships for 2026.

These internships are offered by partner companies and provide practical industry exposure.

Interested students should apply through the placement portal before the deadline.
